25.heading: Viagra.
25.title: "Be Sure to Ask about Side Effects"
25.author: Mike Baldwin.
notes: Summary: Two men with canes are sitting on a park bench; one is reading about Viagra, the one speaking has a very very small head.

26.heading: Viagra.
26.title: "The Endorser Has to Demonstrate a Genuine Need for the Product"
26.author: by Millar-Hinds.
notes: Summary: Before Rocky Palmquist becomes spokesman for the new Viagra rival, he should know that the FDA can be real sticklers.

27.heading: Viagra.
27.title: "The Goddess Viagra"
27.author: by Nicole Hollander.
notes: Summary: Worship with satin and gardenias, play some Johnny Mathis, and the goddess will leave a pill under your pillow.

28.heading: Viagra.
28.title: "Honey, Let's Go Sit in the Van and Hold Hands"
28.author: Nicole Hollander.
notes: Summary: She grumbles about cupholders in cars, and asks if viagra dispensers in the glove compartments are next.

29.heading: Viagra.
29.title: "I Think I'm In Need of some Cyber-Viagra"
29.author: Stantis.
notes: Summary: Sarah beat all his computer game high scores.

30.heading: Viagra.
30.title: "I'll Just Use It Till I Need Glasses"
30.author: Templeton.
notes: Summary: Typical male responds to news that viagra may cause blindness.

31.heading: Viagra.
31.title: "Let's Give the Guys Something Else to Do"
31.author: Nicole Hollander.
notes: Summary: The Goddess Viagra thinks the pill that bears her name will enhance the safety of rhinos, and other large animals.

32.heading: Viagra.
32.title: "A Small Gift Can Do A Lot"

notes: Summary: He opens a box containing a bottle of viagra.

33.heading: Viagra.

34.heading: Viagra.
34.title: "Yeah, Murray, I Get It"

notes: Summary: The Viagra competitor wants to do a before and after advertising campaign, and they need a former pro athlete whose image was, well..
